devdoc.details: BuyFacet specializes in verifying conditions related to limit price buys and Dollar-Cost Averaging (DCA) buys,      ensuring that the necessary criteria are met before executing a buy action.

params.account: The address of the user account that initiated the swap.
params.dex: The address of the contract or dex used for the swap.
params.fromAmount: The amount of 'fromAsset' that was swapped.
params.fromAsset: The address of the asset swapped from.
params.receivedAmount: The amount of 'toAsset' received in the swap.
params.toAsset: The address of the asset received in the swap.

params.impact: The allowable price impact percentage for the buy action.
params.investPrice: the average price at which invest tokens were bought.
params.rounds: the round Ids of invest and stable tokens.
params.strategyId: The unique ID of the strategy where the BTD action was executed.
params.tokens: tokens substracted and added into the users wallet

params.impact: The allowable price impact percentage for the buy action.
params.investPrice: the average price at which invest tokens were bought.
params.stablePriceInUSD: price of stable token in USD
params.strategyId: The unique ID of the strategy where the buy action was executed.
params.tokens: tokens substracted and added into the users wallet

params.impact: The allowable price impact percentage for the buy action.
params.investPrice: the average price at which invest tokens were bought.
params.stablePriceInUSD: price of stable token in USD
params.strategyId: The unique ID of the strategy where the Buy on TWAP action was executed.
params.tokens: tokens substracted and added into the users wallet

params.investTokenPrice: The price of the invest token in USD.
params.stableTokenPrice: The price of the stable token in USD.
params.strategyId: The unique ID of the completed strategy.

params.fromInvestRoundId: The starting invest round ID for monitoring price fluctuations.
params.fromStableRoundId: The starting stable round ID for monitoring price fluctuations.
params.strategyId: The unique ID of the trading strategy where the BTD action is executed.
params.swap: The Swap struct containing address of the decentralized exchange (DEX) and calldata containing data for interacting with the DEX during the execution.
params.toInvestRoundId: The ending invest round ID for monitoring price fluctuations.
params.toStableRoundId: The ending stable round ID for monitoring price fluctuations.

executeBuy(uint256,(address,bytes)).details: The function validates strategy parameters, executes the buy action, and updates the strategy state.

params.strategyId: The unique ID of the strategy for which the buy action is executed.
params.swap: The Swap struct containing address of the decentralized exchange (DEX) and calldata containing data for interacting with the DEX during the execution.

params.strategyId: The unique ID of the strategy to execute the Buy on TWAP action.
params.swap: The Swap struct containing address of the decentralized exchange (DEX) and calldata containing data for interacting with the DEX during the execution.

params.stableAmount: Boolean flag indicating whether to consider the entire stable token amount.
params.strategyId: The unique ID of the strategy for which to calculate the buy value.

returns._0: The calculated buy value based on the specified parameters.

devdoc.title: BuyFacet

AssetSwapped(address,address,address,uin.notice: Emitted when an asset swap has been executed successfully.

BTDExecuted(uint256,uint256,(uint256,uin.notice: Emitted when a Buy The Dip (BTD) action is executed for a trading strategy using a specific DEX, call data, buy value, and execution time.

BuyExecuted(uint256,uint256,(uint256,uin.notice: Emitted when a buy action is executed for a trading strategy.

BuyTwapExecuted(uint256,uint256,(uint256.notice: Emitted when a Buy on Time-Weighted Average Price (TWAP) action is executed for a trading strategy using a specific DEX, call data, buy value, and execution time.

StrategyCompleted(uint256,uint256,uint25.notice: Emitted when a trade execution strategy is completed.

executeBTD(uint256,uint80,uint80,uint80,.notice: Executes a Buy-The-Dip (BTD) trading strategy action within a specified price range. This function allows the strategy to buy the invest token when its price decreases to a certain target value, following a specified DIP strategy type.

executeBuy(uint256,(address,bytes)).notice: Executes a buy action for a trading strategy based on specified conditions.

executeBuyTwap(uint256,(address,bytes)).notice: Executes a Buy on Time-Weighted Average Price (TWAP) action for a trading strategy.

executionBuyAmount(bool,uint256).notice: Calculate the effective value for a buy action in a trading strategy.

userdoc.notice: This facet contains functions responsible for evaluating conditions necessary for executing buy actions.
